name: Luck of the Draw (svetly, Finn Morrison)
name_original: Luck of the Draw (svetly, Finn Morrison)
description:
A competitive game of reaction. Wait until the slot machine stops scrolling, and then fire your gun before the other player does to activate its slot's effect.

Player 1 fires with A.

Player 2 fires with L.

Made by fikemo and svetly. Yee Haw.
